sub_title: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting
summary:
I am an experienced full stack developer, with solid experience in Microsoft technologies and front-end technologies such as React. In 2005, I obtained a Master of Science degree in Software Engineering from the University of Amsterdam and since then I have obtained many years of work experience as IT consultant. From 2012 to 2021, I have worked and lived in Oslo, Norway and since September 2021 I live in the Netherlands again and work as an independent IT consultant.

In my work I am committed to find creative and simple solutions while guaranteeing high quality software development. In past projects I have taken on various roles, including senior developer, architect, and team leader. I have also worked as a technical specialist for system integrations.

I am a certified scrum master and committed to ensuring that software development is carried out smoothly and test-driven. I am a positive and social person and I enjoy working in teams. I strongly believe that well-functioning teamwork is a precondition for high-quality project delivery.

projects.title: Prøveadministrasjonssystem - Utdanningsdirektoratet
projects.description:
Utdanningsdirektoratet is the Norwegian Directorate for Education and Training and is responsible for the development of kindergarten and primary and secondary education. The project involves improving and extending the system that is used for the planning and execution of national exams for primary and secondary education in Norway. 

My responsibility at the project is to reduce the technical dept. I took the lead in upgrading the backend from .Net 4.6 to .Net Core and the frontend to the latest version of React. I further work on improving the build speed, test automation and implementation of semi-automated processes to support the developer with maintaining the solution and reduce future technical dept.

Technologies	ASP.Net MVC, SQL, .Net Core, Octopus Deploy, Azure, Typescript, React, Teamcity
Role	Full-stack developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Waypoint - If Skadeforsikring
projects.description:
If is the leading property and casualty insurer in the Nordic region, with over 3.7 million customers in the Nordic and Baltic countries. The Waypoint project started in 2006 and became one of the biggest .Net project in the Nordic countries. 

As part of the claims handling team, I was responsible for the development of the new portal and services for handling claims together with developers from Norway, Finland and Denmark. The mindset was to develop an automated claim handling process where only human-intervention was required if the system needed additional input to process the claim

Technologies	.NET, .Net Core, Windows Form, React, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy, Powershell, Azure DevOps, MSSQL, TFS
Role	Full-stack developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Devops-initiative - Avinor
projects.description:
Avinor is a state owned company under the Norwegian Ministry of Transport and Communications and is responsible for 44 state-owned airports.

I was part of a team that worked on standardizing the development and the deployment and maintenance of the different IT systems in order to speed up the development and delivery processes.

Technologies	Azure, Java, .NET, DevOps
Role	Developer, Architect

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Kundeportal - Avinor
projects.description:
I was responsible for the design and development of a customer portal for internal inquiries and orders, mainly IT and HR-related. ElasticSearch was used to implement a natural language search engine which could be used to search through all the articles of the knowledge base of Avinor.

Technologies	NodeJS, React / Redux, Continuous deliveries, Elasticsearch
Role	Full-stack developer, Architect

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Made in Norway - Avinor
projects.description:
Made in Norway is a communication initiative from Avinor with the aim to promote companies’ creativity in Norway. I developed a portal where companies could register their contribution and show it to the rest of the country. 
This portal was launched together with a TV serie on TV2 and promotion on all the airports in Norway

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ebz9j6FGiL8
TV serie: https://play.tv2.no/programmer/fakta/made-in-norway

Used technologies: Java, React / Redux, MongoDB, HTML, CSS
Role	Full-stack developer, architect

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Prøveadministrasjonssystem - Utdanningsdirektoratet
projects.description:
The project involved creating a new version of the Prøveadministrasjonssystem (PAS). PAS is a critical application for planning and conducting national exams and test for primary and secondary education in Norway. 

The application was developed as a minimum viable product (MVP) whereby all teams (UX designers, analysts, developers, testers and representatives of the end users) where working closely together.  User story mapping was used to prioritize the user stories and continuous delivery was used to get direct feedback of the end users. I was the team lead for the developers on this project.

Technologies	Asp.net WebApi, React, Javascript, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy
Role	Full-stack developer, Team lead, Scrum master

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Integration NVE - Enova
projects.description:
Enova approves grant-applications for ambitious renovations based on energy label data registered in NVE Energimerkingssystem (EMS). I designed and developed a web service to support the two-way data exchange between EMS and Enova. 

Used technologies: Windows Communication Foundation, C#, TDD
Role	Developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: PGSD-D - Utdanningsdirektoratet
projects.description:
PGS-D is a collaboration website build on Sharepoint making it possible for educators to construct the national exams in Norway together. For this project I implemented "single-sign-on" for PGS-D and the exam administration system to avoid that a user has to login multiple times and to improve the integration with Microsoft Office.

Used technologies: Sharepoint, Windows Identity Foundation.
Role: developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: HEMA
projects.description:
HEMA is an international retail organization with more than 500 stores in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxemburg, France and Germany. At Hema I worked on improving the websites by refining existing features and by introducing new services such as a track and trace system for customers that order product on the website. I was mainly involved in the integration of different business units (Consumer services, Bakery, Marketing, and Distribution Center). nt business units (Consumer services, Bakery, Marketing, and Distribution Center). The portals, which are built on Sharepoint, Commerce Server and CRM, are developed in an agile approach with the use of Scrum.

Technologies	Sharepoint, Commerce Server, CRM, Microsoft Biztalk
Role	Integration specialist

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Achmea
projects.description:
Achmea is the largest insurance group within the Netherlands. To reduce the amount of backend systems and portal platforms for the different brands, a common platform was designed and developed (focused on damage insurances) whereby each brand can still use its own style: standardization on the inside, differentiation on the outside. 

I was involved in the development of the portals which are connected with SAP and other (legacy) backends. The platforms make use of a meta model to compose variations of insurance products. 

Used technologies: C# 3.5, Windows Communication Foundation, TDD (Moq, FluentAssertion, StructureMap), SharePoint
Role	Integration specialist

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Unigroup UTS Weesp
projects.description:
Web application to support relocation of expats which are moving between different countries. The whole process (from planning, packing, transporting and billing) is managed by the application. My responsibility was the authentication and authorization of the web application.

Technologies	ASP.Net Web Application, SQL Server 2008, Windows Workflow Foundation
Role	Developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

projects.title: Port of Rotterdam
projects.description:
I developed a client which visualizes the real estate available for rent within the port of Rotterdam. Geographical data is returned by a Web Feature Service while contract details are retrieved from an SAP system.

Technologies	C#, Windows Communication Foundation, Bing Maps, Silverlight, SharePoint
Role	Developer

contributors.headline: Independent IT consultant at Kongen Consulting

profile_positions.description: Evry is the largest IT company in Norway and the second largest IT services company in the Nordic region. At Evry I participated in the following projects: Utdanningsdirektoratet, Enova and NVE.
profile_positions.title: Senior consultant

profile_positions.description:
Specialized in real-time location-aware applications (Movida) to track and trace persons and objects with different tracking technologies (i.e GPS, RFID, Wifi). The system is used within prisons, oil refineries and retail shops. I was part of the development team creating the desktop client.

Used technologies

-	Eclipse Rich Client Platform
-	Java
-       Oracle Application and database server
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
3D visualization for GIS with the use of a database for storing, retrieving and maintaining the data.

Research on Human Computer Interaction by using new systems like the Multi-touch table.

Used technologies:

-	.Net (C#, Managed C++)
-	OpenSceneGraph
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Design and development of web applications to support business processes for building companies. The application are designed from the end users perspective (for example a contractor). The end user should perform his job without an application training.

Used Technologies:

-	.Net (ASP.Net, C#)
-	Microsoft SQL Server
-	Web techniques like HTML, CSS and Javascript
profile_positions.title: Solution Developer
